alert.note: Alert for Grant; Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:12AM CDT until May 09 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OTTER TAIL...NORTHERN GRANT AND NORTHEASTERN WILKIN COUNTIES... At 812 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Foxhome, or 11 miles southwest of Fergus Falls, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fergus Falls, Rothsay, Underwood, Elizabeth, Erhard, Foxhome and Carlisle. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 30 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
